StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetTotalUnsignedOso369EvalTask]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingFileID uniqueidentifier, @SignatureType int AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
IF @SignatureType = 1 -- for Eval/Aop Signature BEGIN SELECT Count(*) as TotalCount FROM USMC.Evalua.onTask et, USMC.Mul.MonthEvalua.on me WHERE et.Mul.MonthEvalua.onId=me.ID AND me.TrainingFileID=@TrainingFileID AND (EvalSignatureID IS NULL) END ELSE IF @SignatureType = 2 -- for Oso Signature BEGIN SELECT Count(*) as TotalCount FROM USMC.Evalua.onTask et, USMC.Mul.MonthEvalua.on me WHERE et.Mul.MonthEvalua.onId=me.ID AND me.TrainingFileID=@TrainingFileID AND (OsoSignatureID IS NULL)
END
END
